suites.title: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly

beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook: Launch the browser and load the web url in "Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly"
beforeHooks.fullTitle: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly "before all" hook: Launch the browser and load the web url in "Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly"

beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook: Wait for snatchBotPopUpBox to load in "Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly"
beforeHooks.fullTitle: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly "before each" hook: Wait for snatchBotPopUpBox to load in "Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly"

afterHooks.title: "after all" hook: Close the browser in "Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly"
afterHooks.fullTitle: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly "after all" hook: Close the browser in "Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly"

tests.title: 1. Verify snatch bot icon showing pop up circle
tests.fullTitle: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly 1. Verify snatch bot icon showing pop up circle
tests.code:
const eleExists = await assert_utils_1.default.isElementExists(driver, home_page_1.default.snatchBotPopUp_circle);
mocha_utils_1.default.verifyIsTrue(eleExists, 'The snatch bot icon is not showing pop up circle');

tests.title: 2. Verify snatch bot icon showing pop up message box
tests.fullTitle: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly 2. Verify snatch bot icon showing pop up message box
tests.code:
const eleExists = await assert_utils_1.default.isElementExists(driver, home_page_1.default.snatchBotPopUpBox);
mocha_utils_1.default.verifyIsTrue(eleExists, 'The snatch bot icon is not showing pop up message box');

tests.title: 3. Verify if correct message is showing up in snatch bot pop up message box
tests.fullTitle: Test if snatch bot pop up box and icon are showing correctly 3. Verify if correct message is showing up in snatch bot pop up message box
tests.code:
const actualText = await driver_utils_1.default.getText(driver, home_page_1.default.snatchBotPopUpBox);
mocha_utils_1.default.verifyEquals(actualText, homepage_test_data_1.default.snatchIconPopUpBoxMsg, 'The snatch bot icon pop up text box is not showing correct message');

tests.code:

mocha_utils_1.default.verifyIsTrue(eleExists, 'The web page is not showing up in English language');
